flawed_nl_solution:
There were 20 - 5 = <<20-5=51>>51 units of non-defective smartphones.
There were 3 + 7 = <<3+7=10>>10 units sold to customers A and C.
So, 51 - 10 = <<51-10=41>>41 units were sold to customer B.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
